thread.title: BRIEF-Tokyo Individualized Educational Institute to offer off-floor distribution of shares

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tokyo Individualized Educational Institute to offer off-floor distribution of shares
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Tokyo Individualized Educational Institute Inc
* Says it will offer an off-floor distribution of 2.2 million shares on Tokyo Stock Exchange between March 15 and March 20
* Offering price will be determined based on the closing share price of the day before the distribution
* Says the limitation for distribution is up to 10,000 shares for each customer
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/trk2wt
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
